item.title: build a command line java switch
item.description: Add this to your ~/.zshrcafter both versions are installed: # export JAVA_HOME=$(/usr/libexec/java_home) export JAVA_8_HOME=$(/usr/libexec/java_home -v1.8) export JAVA_11_HOME=$(/usr/libexec/java_home -v11) alias java8='export JAVA_HOME=$JAVA_8_HOME' alias java11='export JAVA_HOME=$JAVA_11_HOME' java8 To switch no simple execute: # or switch to java11, default in this example is 8 java11 # ...your stuff will be executed with java11 original post - with deeper explanation
